Yummy site templates for any project.

License

Papaya has an open, simple license.

You may:

  • Use your site template for personal stuff.
  • Use your site template for commercial stuff.
  • Change your site template however you like.

You may not:

  • Sell your site template, or a modification of it, by itself or in a package with other items.
  • Distribute your site template to others. Just point them to eatapapaya.com.

You do not have to:

  • Give attribution to Papaya or Jordan Bowman, although it is appreciated. üòâ
